mapper.select: select table_name as tableName, engine, table_comment as comments, create_time as createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}

select column_name as columnName, data_type as dataType, column_comment as comments, column_key as columnKey, is_nullable as isNullable, column_type as columnType, character_octet_length as characterOctetLength, extra from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
